I have placed an image of the my current best PTSP solution here:

http://sharpneat.sourceforge.net/ptsp_comp/sharpneat_ptsp_map-30-g5_896steps.png

Just from sight you can see there are a few curves and kinks that could 
be 'ironed out' to give a better solution, but on the whole its pretty 
good, especially compared to some of the early solutions that did loops 
the loops and large detours to irrelevant parts of the map - actually 
some of my failed controllers (now in the recycle bin!) generated some 
quite interesting images - one even looked like a biological neuron with 
dendrites coming out of it :)

Colin
